Name: Fish the Detective!
About the game: A noir-themed game about trading. This game is about a fish who must get back to the ocean from a town of unbalanced math equations. You must go into the shops to trade with the townspeople, themselves math symbols, to find an item that gets you to the ocean. Cute n' funny dialogue About a half-hour of gameplay A cartoonish capturing of noir fiction WORKING ON INVENTORY SCREEN.
